page.title: 06SHOPS IN HURST GREEN
page.content: There are 16 shops in{Hurst Green}. The most popular food stores are in { {Pollards Oak}and{Holland Road.}There are shops in{Holland Crescent, {Tanhouse Lane}and{Mill Lane.} Wherever you live there is a shop quite close to you. They sell anything you need to get through the day. They sell things like{Video Films}(hired), {drinks, sweets, fruits}and even{cards} and{games.}They are very useful and are spread over{Hurst Green.}They include a{Wine store, Post Office, {several food stores, Drapers, Stamp {shop, Antique shops, Hairdressers, {Chemist}and a few other shops. There is no{dentist}in{Hurst Green,}there was one but it is now a block of flats.
